title: 1M versus 690,420 Supply Vote
body:
👨‍🌾Calling all farmers, now that we have a lot more learnings on the finer points of chad agriculture from the last 4 weeks, it is time to consider whether the original 5M farmland supply plan still makes sense.

🌈 After long hours of fruitful discussion on the cultivation of our fertile hectares, our farmers, lumberjacks, craftsmen, and farmhands have come out with two representative poll options to greatly increase the scarcity of farmland, and cut between 80-86% of future emissions, starting from Tuesday Sep 29th, at 7pm UTC.

📈  While homesteaders stake out their claim in harvest's great expansion, the arable land is a limited resource that has access to the cashflows of harvest, this poll determines the guideline path for arable farmland going forward.

🎑 Harvest works on emissions, slightly more emissions might give harvest future leeway to take advantage of opportunities, slightly less emissions might decrease some options, but increase the scarcity of farmland. The price of FARM has a lot of impact on how much emissions are required for Harvest to achieve its goals of becoming the go-to place for everyone to park their assets and become the largest globally accessible autonomous hedge fund.

Both plans are available here:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11A0NPrm3rDtA11WqQGXKQ9bFlFSa6Zbb0Fng5jpM5L0/edit?usp=sharing

Option 🍓
Move to the 1M total supply plan

Option 🍒
Move to the 690,420 total supply plan
choices: 🍓 Move to the 1M total supply plan
🍒 Move to the 690,420 total supply plan
author: 0x252E7E8B9863f81798B1fEF8CfD9741A46De653C
